channel.title: [525] *SalvationX* Rsps eco/pking
channel.description:
*Duel Arena fully fixed *Alot of bosses. *Pking with bounty hunter targets/rare drops. *alot of minigames *active pking/nice switching * all skills * some rare costum's *loyalty shop/loyalty points each hour. * nice donator benefits *friendly community
Welcome to SalvationX, the RuneScape private server brought to you by kush and Sky. We have over 30 registered members, playable 24/7.Here at SalvationX we take a different approach the other generic servers you come across. We work endlessly to bring you dedicated, high performance environment to play our enjoyable, content-filled server emulator.We invest alot of dollars into our secure and stable server architecture to ensure dedicated uptime and a fast connection, all protected behind high quality firewall mechanisms. Security and stability are very important to us, that's why we make sure we are the best around at offering this.In regard to content, Salvationx is a spawn server,We also have some of the most enjoyable Pking around, our Wilderness zones are always packed with pkers.
